text: Miracles from Heaven: A Little Girl, Her Journey to Heaven, and Her Amazing Story of Healing is a memoir written by American writer Christy Beam. The book was published on 14 April 2015. Beam wrote the book about her daughter, Annabel Beam. == Movie adaptation == Sony Pictures Entertainment has created a movie adaptation of the book with the same name. Jennifer Garner, Kylie Rogers, Queen Latifah, Martin Henderson, and Eugenio Derbez are actors in the movie. == References == == Other websites == * * Miracles from Heaven at History vs. Hollywood Category:2015 books
title: Miracles from Heaven
